org.concordion.ext.storyboard

Class StoryboardListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.concordion.ext.storyboard.StoryboardListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertEqualsListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertFalseListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertTrueListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ConcordionBuildListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ExampleListener, org.concordion.api.listener.SpecificationProcessingListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ThrowableCaughtListener

    public class StoryboardListener
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.concordion.api.listener.AssertEqualsListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertTrueListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertFalseListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ConcordionBuildListener, org.concordion.api.listener.SpecificationProcessingListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ThrowableCaughtListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ExampleListener
    Listens to Concordion events and/or method calls and then adds the required cards to the story board.

      • addContainer

        public void addContainer(Container container)
        Add container to storyboard. If a container is already open close it first.
        Parameters:
        container - if null this is regarded as stating all future cards should be added to the storyboard/parent container

      • insertContainer

        public void insertContainer(Container container)
        Add container to storyboard. If a container is already open, append new container to it.
        Parameters:
        container - if null this is regarded as stating all future cards should be added to the storyboard/parent container
